mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
INSERT INTO pay_merchant_info (mer_orgParentId,mer_chainParentId,mer_accNo,mer_mchName,mer_mchDesc,mer_mchType,mer_contacts,mer_contactsCell,mer_email,mer_mchNo,mer_mchKey,mer_mchRSAKey,mer_mchAPPId,mer_mchPayPassWord,mer_googleAuthUrl,mer_googleAuthKey,mer_googleAuthFlag,mer_isDel,mer_state,mer_authState,mer_validIP,mer_createTime,mer_updateTime) SELECT * FROM (
SELECT #{orgParentId} as mer_orgParentId, #{chainParentId} as mer_chainParentId, #{accNo} as mer_accNo, #{mchName} as mer_mchName, #{mchDesc} as mer_mchDesc, #{mchType} as mer_mchType, #{contacts} as mer_contacts, #{contactsCell} as mer_contactsCell, #{email} as mer_email, #{mchNo} as mer_mchNo, #{mchKey} as mer_mchKey, #{mchRSAKey} as mer_mchRSAKey, #{mchAPPId} as mer_mchAPPId, #{mchPayPassWord} as mer_mchPayPassWord, #{googleAuthUrl} as mer_googleAuthUrl, #{googleAuthKey} as mer_googleAuthKey, #{googleAuthFlag} as mer_googleAuthFlag, #{isDel} as mer_isDel, #{state} as mer_state, #{authState} as mer_authState, #{validIP} as mer_validIP, #{createTime} as mer_createTime, #{updateTime} as mer_updateTime FROM DUAL
) A
mapper.update:
UPDATE pay_merchant_info
mer_mchId = #{mchId},
mer_orgParentId = #{orgParentId},
mer_chainParentId = #{chainParentId},
mer_accNo=#{accNo},
mer_mchName=#{mchName},
mer_mchDesc=#{mchDesc},
mer_mchType=#{mchType},
mer_contacts=#{contacts},
mer_contactsCell=#{contactsCell},
mer_email=#{email},
mer_mchNo=#{mchNo},
mer_mchKey=#{mchKey},
mer_mchRSAKey=#{mchRSAKey},
mer_mchAPPId=#{mchAPPId},
mer_mchPayPassWord=#{mchPayPassWord},
mer_googleAuthUrl=#{googleAuthUrl},
mer_googleAuthKey=#{googleAuthKey},
mer_googleAuthFlag=#{googleAuthFlag},
mer_isDel=#{isDel},
mer_state=#{state},
mer_authState=#{authState},
mer_validIP=#{validIP},
mer_createTime=#{createTime},
mer_updateTime=#{updateTime}
WHERE mer_mchId = #{mchId}
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM pay_merchant_info WHERE mer_mchId IN
#{mchId}
mapper.select: select count(*) from pay_merchant_info where mer_mchId = #{mchId}
